title: Gran signs extension through 2020

organizations.name: university of kentucy office of legal counsel

text:
Slot to Kentucky Links (Photo: Gary Moyers, 247Sports) 
After leading the Kentucky offense to a historic season in his first year on the sidelines, offensive coordinator Eddie Gran has signed a contract extension through 2020. 
According to the document posted on the University of Kentucy Office of Legal Counsel , Gran's compensation will also increase from $650,000 to $825,00 for the 2017 season and jump to $850,000 next year. In the final year of the contract, which expires on June 30, 2020, Gran is set to earn $875,000. 
The bonus structure laid out in the contract amendment awards Gran one month's salary for an appearance in a non-College Football Playoff bowl game, 1.5 months' salary for a berth in the SEC Championship game and two months' salary for a College Football Playoff appearance. The bonuses will not be cumulative, the contract stipulates. 
Should Gran take another job, he will pay UK $150,000 per year remaining on the contract. The amendment was signed on Jan. 1 by Gran, athletic director Mitch Barnhart and Bill Swinford from the office of University of Kentucky President Eli Capilouto. 
New UK defensive coordinator Matt House also received a contract amendment , dated Jan. 30, 2017, following his promotion after the departure of D.J. Eliot to Colorado. House's contract now expires on June 30, 2020 and pays him $650,000 per season, a significant bump from the $250,000 he made last season as special teams coordinator and inside linebackers coach. He too must pay the school $150,000 per year of the remaining deal should he leave for a job elsewhere. ESPN unveils latest college hoops power rankings Start SlideShow 
Contracts have also been posted for new UK assistants Dean Hood and Derrick LeBlanc . Hood, the Cats' new special teams coordinator and outside linebackers coach, will make $350,000 per year through June 30, 2019. LeBlanc, who takes over as defensive line coach, will earn $300,000 through the same date. The bonus schedule for House, Hood and LeBlanc follows the same structure as laid out in Gran's contract.
